comment: I recommend!! Course Details: Download Suitable App, complete at own pace. Very few hard deadlines. Must participate in 2 events and 7 total easy activities. I completed all 7 activities within 3 days. The 2 events was done within 2 weeks. Suitable App provides when and where the events are and you just choose which ones to attend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: Cares about her students and gives great feedback on assignments!
Taking her again next semester for 4150! she's awesome, She really cares about her students and gives great advice/& necessary feedback !

Dr Hollman is a wonderful counselor and professor. Throughout my time at Coles, she has been very encouraging through all of my BUSA courses. She definitely is understanding and helpful with good advice and helps you research and grow upon your strengths!

Dr.Hollman is amazing. I took her for MGT 4171 online class... super easy.  Assignments ,Group projects and quizzes was easy . She is fair grader. If you are looking for an easy elective ... take this class with her. She is good.  Make sure you buy the textbook. It helped me in my final  a lot .
Took this class online. EXTREMELY easy. Just make sure you take the quizzes (which are unlimited tries) & do the case studies. Minimial group work and the two required papers are very easy. Got an A.

Took online, relatively easy class, pretty light workload, just stay up to date with work & get a good group. Grading: 6 online quizzes 15 pnts each, two papers 75 pts each, group assignments 225 pts, 6 case discussions 10 pts each, online final 100 pts, intro 5 pnts. Total grade out of 630 pnts. She's a fair grader & is very active in the class
Great professor...took this class online. Hard class but you will learn much about labor relations.
Took class online. Fairly easy A. Did not like how quizzes were presented. Group project was a bit unclear. 2 Papers, 4 quizzes, 1 group powerpoint.
